attributes.action: Maggie Oliver to oversee the grooming  inquiry, with tbe aid of a kings council.
attributes.additional_details: It is clear that a lot of politicians police councillors social services and pressure groups, do not want a full and focused inquiry, thiscould all be avoided by a none political appointment with a legal advisor
attributes.background: I want the government to hold a clear and effective grooming gang inquiry, which will be unhindered by political interference

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes requests for individuals to be appointed to or removed from office.
